name: Rolling in the Deep (vogonCF, slackbyte, ComradeLily, mrs_jme_e)
name_original: Rolling in the Deep (vogonCF, slackbyte, ComradeLily, mrs_jme_e)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 game jam. 

Theme: Roll of the Dice

WASD to move 

Click to Shoot 

Shift to use power up (after you score 1000 pts)

Esc to pause

Dice debris are rolling from the depths of the ocean, where can they be coming from?  Will you risk your soul to get to the bottom of this mystery? 

Clear the debris to achieve a high score, leave your high score in the comments ⬇️⬇️⬇️
